WRITING.TITLE: TIL of Joseph Prushinowski, a devout Hassidic Jew and con artist who stole $190 million over decades. Much of which he gave away.
A renowned guru in China has been arrested on suspicion of involvement in the kidnapping and murder of one of his disciples, Chinese state media report.

Rome is on the verge of collapse and needs urgent repair, leaders warn. The Eternal City is in chronic decline as a result of a toxic mix of corruption, debt, poor administration and shabby infrastructure.
Albert Einstein and Rabindranath Tagore, July 14, 1930.
The Shigir Idol, twice as ancient as the Egyptian Pyramids.
